main event: On August 6, 1966, a UFO was reported hovering near an orange tree in Harlingen, Texas.
interesting points: The object was initially observed by three children aged 6 to 9 who claimed to see a small person appear in a square of light,The object was shaped like an upside-down cup and was dark with no lights,During the observation, one square yellow light appeared,The object made a low humming sound during its departure and traveled northeast at an average speed,The witness' family had additional sightings, including a bright flash of light a few days later.
sighted object: an upside down cup shaped object with a square yellow light
witness description: Three children and the father observed the UFO, with additional sightings reported by the daughter during a second sitting.
